x86x64::MmVarÂ¶

struct asmjit::x86x64::MmVar
#include <x86defs.h>

Mm variable.

Public Functions

MmVar()

Create new uninitialized MmVar instance.

MmVar(BaseCompiler & c, uint32_t type = kVarTypeMm, const char * name = NULL)

Create new initialized MmVar instance.

MmVar(const MmVar & other)

Create new MmVar instance using other.

Note this will not create a different variable, use Compiler::newMmVar() if you want to do so. This is only copy-constructor that allows to store the same variable in different places.

MmVar(const _NoInit &)

Create new uninitialized MmVar instance (internal).

MmVar clone()

Clone MmVar operand.

void reset()

Reset MmVar operand.

MmVar & operator=(const MmVar & other)

bool operator==(const MmVar & other)

bool operator!=(const MmVar & other)
